meanings.definition: Having or revealing an obstinate belief in the superiority of one's own opinions and a prejudiced intolerance of the opinions of others.
meanings.sent1: The bigoted man refused to listen to anyone else's ideas.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her bigoted views on people from different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The bigoted squirrel believed it was the smartest in the forest.
meanings.sent4: His bigoted mindset was like a wall blocking out any differing perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The bigoted teacher's closed-mindedness hindered the class discussions.
